```{r}
rds_files <- dir("../de_summary_1225/", pattern=".rds")
tidied <- vector(mode="list", length=length(rds_files))
rsq <- vector(mode="list", length=length(rds_files))
for(i in seq_along(rds_files)) {
  dat <- read_rds(file.path("../de_summary_1225/", rds_files[i]))
  tidied[[i]] <- dat$pe_tidied
  rsq[[i]] <- dat$rsq
}
tidied <- bind_rows(tidied)
rsq <- bind_rows(rsq)


```
